tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bleeding Gums Treatment,Dental Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I visited Expert Dental Care for tooth pain . Dr.Mounica and Dr.Anoop provided skilled treatment for Root canal,  crowns, gums .They have taken care excellently ,smoothly without any issues ..Finally Iam fully satisfied for their dental care. I feel it is a very good dental care center ..

Thank you very much Dr.Mounica and Dr.Anoop garu for your special care for my dental problems ...
SUDHAKARA RAO PVB

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Fillings,
review:
I really thank Dr. Anoop sir and Dr. Mounika mam for the precious treatment .
My self Shravan and I have been suffering from the tooth aches since 8 years ..
I cross checked with three other dental hospitals .. but they said 5 of my teeth has to be extracted and with Very less hope.. I thought my teeth problem is is peak stage and lost hopes on my teeth.. Almost 9 teeth got spoiled..
The moment I get to know about the Expert Dental care..
In miyapur..from one of my neighbours... I visited there.
Dr.Mounika ..mam has checked and explained the issue clearly and after the treatment plan.. Hopes arised in me ..
I have undergone  8 Root canal Treatment  and one extraction ..And Now Im completely alright and can eat every thing ...
* Expert Dental Care stands for 
* Complete Care Treatment 
*Excellent Hospitality
*Time to Time follow up about the conditions
* Budget Friendly 
*High Quality Equipment
One thing I really loved is that Dr.Anoop and Dr.Mounika ...will not satisfy till they get the best output and they will treat with high patience...
In my case they took number of scannings to make sure everything is perfect.
They will treat the patients  with love and care...
I once again thank you for your high quality treatment with outmost care
I would suggest its a boon for every one and you can trust this Expert Dental Care ..completely...
Regards
Shravan
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback and We are glad that you are satisfied with our dental services. Your positive feedback motivates us to deliver the best for our patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The experience with the treatment is excellent but the reception attitude and manipulation of charges is unbearable,because of such unprofessional staff creates negative impact on the clinic,Need to councel  the supporting staff is utmost required.
Doctor rating 5/5
Reception rating 0.5/5
reply_text: Hai mam, thanku for your feedback, we are happy that you liked treatment and experience with doctors at expert dental care, and same time we apologize for your situation at billing counter, but just wanted to clarify that we have 3 dental assistants, may be the person who spoke to you may not convey your discount charges to the other person and they were on leave on that day , that might be the reason she might be collecting  normal crown charges from you as she was unaware , that was purely miscommunication, we apologize for that as we couldn't make a note as it was on call, but there intention was not to grab extra amount or charge extra or to manipulate , hopefully you understand the situation mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Thanks both of you Dr. Anoop sir and Dr. Mounika madam for the excellent treatment .

For my daughter root canal we visited the clinic.** *** **** **** *********, especially the way of explanation and treat the patient is superb...

Awesome.Thanks Mounika madam and Anoop sir

Strongly recommend this clinic.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback and We are glad that you are satisfied with our dental services. Your positive feedback motivates us to deliver the best for our patients.

tags: None
review:
Dr Mounika did a stellar job during my recent visit. I had to get some filling redone and Dr Mounika did the composite placement such that it looked very aesthetically pleasing and also enabled scope for flossing which was absent in the earlier filling. 
I have always had a good experience with Expert Dental. Dr Mounika is very approachable; her calm demeanor will put you at ease. Her detailed assessment, clarity on the situation and outcome and practical tips are a big help. Highly recommend.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback and We are glad that you are satisfied with our dental services. Your positive feedback motivates us to deliver the best for our patients.

tags: None
review:
Doctor’s explanation and communication about the treatment, and also issue is crystal clear .
Things I liked about the doctor are
She is very genuine and gentle.
Madam is thorough and accurate in her diagnosis.
She follow through treatment leaving no stone unturned.
She listens to patient concerns and provide recommendations and responses for the best course of action.

Iam completely satisfied and strongly recommend Doctor Mounika.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback and We are glad that you are satisfied with our dental services. Your positive feedback motivates us to deliver the best for our patients.

review: If you are like me and have a fear of dentist the I would surely recommend Dr.mounika and expert dental care ,I had a severe pain and had taken an immediate appointment. My request was handled very professionally by the tear. When I met the doctor,all my queries were addressed and explained properly which greated trust.
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words and positive feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for a general check-up and cleaning, and I must say I was thoroughly impressed with her professionalism & expertise. From the moment I stepped into the clinic, I was greeted with a warm smile and felt completely at ease. Dr. Mounika took the time to thoroughly examine my teeth, gums, and mouth, and explained everything in detail, making sure I fully understood what was going on. She was gentle, thorough, and made the whole process a breeze. I would highly recommend Dr. Mounika to anyone looking for an exceptional dental experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback and We are glad that you are satisfied with our dental services. Your positive feedback motivates us to deliver the best for our patients.

tags: None
review:
We feel the Expert Dental Hospital is a good one.
 Dr. Anoop and Dr. Mounica treatment levels r excellent in all aspects. 
I wd like to share my recent experience with them. 
A week ago I suffered with severe pain at wisdom teeth 
 I immediately rushed to the hospital. 
We really feel so happy for their way of approach on treatment with a pleasent manner. 
Secondly wd like to appreciate for their continuity in asking about the improvement day by day about the condition swelling -  pain and to about usage of medicines etc;
This is my second visit to Expert Detal Hospital. 
Finally I conclude that Doctor's r good 
With best Regards, 
T. Mandapal
ITC LTD
Retired excecutive in Accounts
